marginalia.anchor_text: qua[m]uis alie sc[i]e[n]tie p[er] rationes disputant mathematic[us] v[er]o sensibiliter lineis in puluere descriptis

position.marginalia_text: Mathematic[us] sensibiliter p[otes]t disputare ali[a]e artes tantu[m] r[ati]o[n]es possu[n]t.

marginalia.translation: A mathematician can discuss sensibly. Other arts only can [discuss] reasons.

marginalia.anchor_text: Et p[ri]mo ostendit quom[od]o sume[n]da sit instantia c[on]tra silogismu[m] demonstratiuu[m]

position.marginalia_text: Quomodo est sumenda insta[n]tia co[n]tra demo[n]stratiuu[m] syllogis[mum].

marginalia.translation: In this way urgency is to be gathered against the demonstrative syllogism.

marginalia.anchor_text: indemo[n]stratiuis scie[n]tijs no[n] fiu[n]t p[ar]alogismi in dictio[n]e. secu[n]do nec extra dictione[m]

position.marginalia_text: In Mathematicis et demo[n]stratiuis scie[n]tijs, no[n] fiu[n]t parallogismi in dictione, aut extra dictionem:

marginalia.translation: In mathematics and demonstrative science, paralogisms appear neither in or outside of speech.

position.marginalia_text: Mathematica disciplina in p[ri]mo gradu certitudinis

marginalia.translation: The mathematical discipline is first and foremost about certainty.

marginalia.anchor_text: in demo[n]stratiuis scie[n]tijs no[n] accidit deceptio p[er] fallacia[m] extra dictione[m]

position.marginalia_text: Fallacia[m] extra dictionem no[n] committi in demo[n]stratiuis scie[n]tijs

marginalia.translation: In the demonstrative sciences, deceipts are not to be commited outside of speech.
